#summary Instructions for the installation of LAMBADA.

= Installation =

== Linux ==

=== Download ===
Download the LAMBADA archive from the [http://code.google.com/p/lambada-align/downloads/list project download] website:

=== Unpack ===
LAMBADA is available as compressed `tar.gz` archive.
Extract the files to your `lib` directory:
{{{ tar -xvzf lambada.tar.gz }}}


Copy the folder to your lib directory (e.g. cp -r lambada/ ~/lib)
Make LAMBADA executable (e.g. chmod 755 ~/lib/lambada/lambada)
Set a soft link to the LAMBADA executable (e.g. ln -s ~/lib/lambada/lambada ~/bin/lambada)
